basics.name: Gaétan Gnim Amah
basics.label: Software & Data Engineer in Training
basics.summary:
Junior Full Stack Developer** passionate about web application development and solving technical problems. I have skills in both front-end and back-end technologies including Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, and databases.

I'm looking for a professionalization contract in software development or data analysis starting September 2025. I want to join a dynamic team where I can continue learning and contribute to innovative projects.

work.name: KU Leuven, Bruges Campus, Belgium
work.position: Intern in embedded systems and IoT development
work.summary: Development of an application for controlling and visualizing data from the Smart Plate, with a graphical interface to facilitate parameter management and real-time data monitoring.
highlights: Created the first desktop application to communicate with the existing prototype, which previously only had MATLAB code
Developed a web app and converted it into a desktop application, establishing communication channels and enabling data collection and management
responsibilities: Independently developed a functional application to control and monitor the Smart Plate prototype
Collaborated with the research department of KU Leuven, with guidance from my supervisor (a researcher in the department)
Set up communication channels between the Smart Plate prototype and the newly developed application
Integrated real-time data monitoring features and graphical interface for easier parameter management
achievements: Provided a fully functional, scalable desktop application ready for use, although deployment was not required as it was part of a research project

education.institution: ESEO - École Supérieure d'Électronique de l'Ouest, Angers
courses: InfraLogiciel Project : Development of an online bank (Java, API, Web, Database)
FallingBlox : Design of a Tetris-inspired game in Java with JUnit tests
Web & Data Project : Creation of a simulated social network (MySQL, PHPMyAdmin, HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
REST API Project : Development of a secure server in Java with Spring Boot and Maven, connected to a database

certificates.name: Prévention Sup'- Le serious game en santé et sécurité au travail

projects.name: InfraLogiciel Project
projects.description: Development of an online bank with a Java application for internal management, a website for customers and a common API connected to a single database.
highlights: Developed with Java, Spring, Javascript, Html, Css
Implemented a REST API connected to a SQL database
Created a user interface for clients and administrators.

projects.name: FallingBlox
projects.description: Design of a Tetris-inspired game in Java, integrating automated tests with JUnit.
highlights: Developed in Java with an object-oriented architecture
Collision management and Tetris-inspired game mechanics.

projects.name: Web & Data Project
projects.description: Creation of a simulated social network with a MySQL database, a web interface and management via PHPMyAdmin.
highlights: Back-end development with MySQL and PHP
Creating a web interface with HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Data management and modeling via PHPMyAdmin

projects.name: REST API Project
projects.description: Creation of a secure server in Java with Spring Boot and Maven, connected to a database.
highlights: Implementing a Secure REST API with Spring Boot
Integration with a Relational SQL Database
